docstring.long_description:
This block should also work with compatible Tektronix RSAXXX instruments.

Tested with RSA507a.
docstring.short_description: Extract Block IQ measurement from a Tektronix RSA.

parameters.name: ref_level
parameters.description: The reference level (the maximum y axis value), in dBm.

parameters.name: record_length
parameters.description: The length to record (length of x axis), in ms.
